Who: CYCLONUS, Nightlight
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

> "That's Great"hissed the male by comlink"As soon as they arrive pass them to
> the throne Room, When i finsh here I'l go there"

"Understood." Cyclonus said. With a few deft touches Cyclonus sent off
a few orders as he glanced up and looked at the female as she sat on
the stairs in front of the throne.

"Greetings." he said to the female as he walked over to her. "I know
that this has been a trying time for you." Cyclonus said, his voice
and movements elegant, strong and yet graceful. Cyclonus stood tall
and robust, his armor shined purple and white, glinting slightly in
the relfected light of the room. He was like a powerful knight of some
great reknowned speaking to a fair princesses.

Cyclonus folded one hand behind his back as he reached down with
other, bowing his head slightly in an almost courtly gesture. His
fingers were strong yet somehow gentle as sought to grasp the Lady's
hand and help her to her feet. Tilting his head up and to the side
slightly Cyclonus looked at her, his penatrating gaze staring into
hers, "What is your name?" he said.

(TAG)

Preston
